name: Avarice (itch) (cpt001)
description:
This game is a vast experiment that's designed to challenge my own programming skills, and see just how far I can personally push unity!

This game is channeling elements from Disney's Pirates Online, Sid Meier's Pirates, Sea of Thieves, and AC4 Black Flag, while adding in more flavor from my own personal preferences!

It's still extremely early in development, but I'm really excited to share the game's progress with you as I make it!

If you want to follow my personal progress, you can see my trello here!

https://trello.com/b/iiS8p3iA/avarice
